content.wheretofind: Where can I find Cookiebot Domain Group ID?

instruction.description: Cookiebot Consent Management Platform (CMP) automatically detects all cookies and similar trackers on your website and blocks them until your users have given their consent. This is a unique technology. Learn about all the functions of Cookiebot below.
instruction.step2Label: Step 2. Get Cookiebot Domain Group ID from the dashboard
instruction.step3Description: Paste your Cookiebot Domain Group ID, and copy the code
instruction.step4Description: Paste the code into your Cloudflare Worker

note.title: Note
note.l1: Remove both GTM and Cookiebot tags from your code(Cloudflare Workers insert them into your website)
note.l2: Do not need to use Cookiebot CMP template tag in GTM
note.l3: Configure your GTM tags with additional consent checkes.
note.l3Link: Please refer to the document here.
